description: Elm is a new programming language based on the idea of Functional Reactive Programming (FRP). Elm lets you create highly interactive web applications without all the messy callbacks tangling around shared states. In this talk Yan Cui will give a gentle introduction to Elm and share his experience learning Elm and creating a game of Snake in under 15 mins!
title: PolyConf 16: My adventure with Elm / Yan Cui
